sentences.en: A school is a principal's jurisdiction.
An industrial tribunal has no jurisdiction to decide whether an employee was fairly or unfairly dismissed.
sentences.cn: 劳资仲裁法庭无权判定解雇是否正当。

sentences.en: As the killings took place outside British jurisdiction, the Ministry of Defence could not be held liable.
sentences.cn: 谋杀案发生在英国司法管辖范围外，故国防部无须对其负责。

sentences.en: As the name implies, the courts of appeals have appellate jurisdiction.
sentences.cn: 顾名思义, 上诉法院有受理上诉的裁判权.

sentences.en: Changzhou is under the jurisdiction of Jiangsu Province.
He had sole jurisdiction in maritime and seafaring causes.
sentences.cn: 他对海商案件拥有专属管辖权.

sentences.en: It hardly falls within the area under the police station's jurisdiction.
sentences.cn: 它几乎不在该派出所的辖区之内.

sentences.en: That case is under the jurisdiction of this court.
sentences.cn: 那宗案件属本法庭受理范围.

sentences.en: The British police have no jurisdiction over foreign bank accounts.
sentences.cn: 外国银行账户不在英国警方的管辖权限之内。

sentences.en: The court has no jurisdiction over foreign diplomats living in this country.
sentences.cn: 法院对驻本国的外交官无裁判权.

sentences.en: These islands have always been under Chinese jurisdiction. This is known to all.
sentences.cn: 这些岛屿一向属中国管辖, 这是众所周知的.

sentences.en: They appeared in court not to raise defences , but to challenge the court jurisdiction.
sentences.cn: 他们来法院不是应诉, 而是抗辩.

sentences.en: This division continued to exercise the admiralty jurisdiction.
sentences.cn: 该分庭一直行使海事管辖权.

sentences.en: This is a matter that comes within the jurisdiction of the autonomous region.
sentences.cn: 这件事是属于自治区权限以内的事务.

sentences.en: This tremendous expansion of federal jurisdiction has given rise to some administrative problems.
sentences.cn: 这种联邦司法概念的惊人扩大,已经引起了一些管理上的问题.

司法权，[法]审判权，管辖权；权限，权力

trans.tran_cn: 司法权，管辖权，管辖范围，权限
trans.tran_en: the right to use an official power to make legal decisions, or the area where this right exists
